h1.strong: Order our Personal Lubricants at Wholesale rates...

span.strong: In the U.S our office is located in Chicago and our distribution centres are in Los Angeles and Pennsylvania.

div.p: We offer two ways of ordering, online and offline.

An online account allows you to order directly on this website, a fully automated system. Pay by Visa, MasterCard, Amex or PayPal. There is no minimum order. Orders are routed to the closest distribution centre for prompt delivery.
Step 1. Enter your business contact information, click "CREATE MY ACCOUNT"

Step 2. On the next screen, click "REQUEST WHOLESALE ACCOUNT" and follow the instructions to send the approval request. You must request your account be upgraded to receive access towholesale prices. We strive to approve all requests within 48 hours, but it's usually quicker. To expedite your request call us on +1 (773) 942 0030 ext 602 or contact our sales team by email sales(at)sasmar.com
Once your account is approved, you will be able to login and place orders 24/7.
A dedicated Account Manager will be assigned to your account. Approved accounts receive up to 30 day trading terms, to open a trade account please complete and return the Credit Application form.
